features: 【Carbon Fiber Material】: Car seat belt shoulder pads are made of high-quality carbon fiber leather, soft and luxurious touch, prevent the seat belt from rubbing your neck and shoulders. Avoid to make you feel uncomfortable. It is resistant to wear, not easy to fade, scratch resistance, very strong and durable.

【Cool and Stylish Design】: The car seat belt cover is designed with carbon fiber texture, which is fashionable, exquisite and compact, high-quality appearance and classic shape. It is an excellent seat belt shoulder protector, which can decorate your car, make your car more beautiful and dazzling, and also show your cool and stylish personality and unique taste.

【Universal and Multifunction】: Measuring 2.6 x 9.1 inches, this seat belt cover is suitable for all automotive seat belts and can be easily installed on the seat belts of most cars, trucks, SUVs, RVS, vans and SUVs. Also suitable for home, office, school, you can also install it in your backpack, suitcase, camera or any other place you need.

【Easy to Install】: The carbon fiber automotive seat belt shoulder pads allow for quick installation and quick removal. It has a velcro design, does not require any tools, very simple to install. Rip the velcro, wrap it around the car seat belt, attach the Velcro, adjust the height, and the installation is complete.

【Great Gift】: There are 2 seat belt covers in the package to meet the shoulder protection needs of drivers and passengers. It is soft and makes wearing a seatbelt so much more comfortable. With this seatbelt cover you don't have to keep adjusting and pulling the seatbelt down. You can send it as a gift to your friend, family and someone you care about.
body.description: Specifications: Material: Leather Color: Black, Black/Red, Black/Blue, Black/Purple, Black/Wine Red Size: 2.6 x 9.1 inches Weight: 0.05kg Package Include: 2 x Car Seat Belt Cover Do you encounter the following problems? -The seat belt is too stiff and makes your shoulder uncomfortable. -The rubbing of the seat belt make your skin itchy. -The seat belt can pull on your knitted top, causing it to pilling or warp. -The seat belt cannot be kept in place during driving. Our seat belt shoulder cover solves the above problems for you, and provides you with more ways to use: 1. When you drive, the carbon fiber seat belt shoulder cover is stylish and beautiful. 2. When you travel, install it on luggage to reduce stress and make travel more comfortable. 3. When you work, install it on the seat handle, you will feel comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but Awkward
reviews.reviewText: I am short, so shoulder straps in most cars end up cutting into my neck. I got this seat belt cover to remedy that. Cover is definitely well padded and comfortable, but it tends to slide easily down the seat belt strap and I end up with the strap cutting into my neck again. Also, it is very awkward when you unbuckle your seat belt and the belt tries to retract back into position. The cover gets in the way and the seatbelt ends up hanging down where it can either get stuck in the door or hook you as you are getting out of the car. So, you have to slide the belt manually through the cover so it can retract. Truthfully, the jury is still out on whether or not I will continue using this. I'm not sure hassling with it is worth the benefit it provides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well, even if not as intended
reviews.reviewText: Review of: Osilly 2PCS Car Seat Belt Cover, (Black)As I am not the tallest person in the world, I’ve found that the seat belt on my car keeps rubbing on my collarbone and even though I have adjusted the seat belt height to all kinds of different positions, nothing really helps.So I got these Osilly Seatbelt Covers hoping it would solve the issue.They are, indeed, really easy (using the hook&loop flap) to put on and off the seat belt so that is a plus though I did notice that I have to put the flap side of the product (the part that doesn’t show all the nice stitching) upward in order to have the flatter side against my body; which was a bit of a surprise as it is opposite of how the first picture on the product page shows the product being used.Still, that’s a small issue for me as comfort is more important than looks.The first time I used the cover, though, I found that the seat belt itself couldn’t retract if the cover was still up near the height adjustment. I didn’t want to have to remove these every time. But it turns out that if the cover is fastened loosely enough I can slide the cover down as I retract the seat belt and then just slide them back up when I’m ready to go again. A little awkward, but not bad.Try as I might, though, I couldn’t find a place where the cover actually helped. Putting the cover over the spot that was rubbing my collarbone just meant that now the cover was the thing rubbing the collarbone.Then, I pushed it up out of the way...success! I tucked it far enough into the shoulder height adjustment slot that I could use it to give me slack in the seat belt itself...and that was enough to keep the belt off of my collarbone. So, not the way this was intended to be used...but for the price, it worked for me.Another family member, though, especially when using the seat belt cover on the driver’s side (where the height of the seat itself can be adjusted up/down) had a more ‘typical’ reaction to the seat belt covers and found that the extra cushion provided by the cover did help reduce the pressure felt across the upper chest.And, as far as cushion is concerned, the overall softness/comfort level of these seat belt covers falls into my ‘just okay’ category; not a thick as I would have liked but sufficient to help.And I love that I got it in the black with the orange/red stitching so I matches my upholstery perfectly.Overall, especially at a price of right around $8 for a two pack, and considering the decent build quality of the product, I think the seat belt covers are a nice to have addition to the car.If this review was helpful, please click the Helpful button below as that helps me know that I'm providing useful information in these reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
